entry.title: Biodegradable Loofah Exfoliating Mitt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boutique Love Attack
Type: Exfoliating Gloves
Price: 4.00

This double sided exfoliating mitt is made from natural loofah and cotton. Made for cleansing and exfoliating, this waste free, natural and eco-friendly skincare tool gently and effectively removes dead skin on the body leaving it smooth and soft. Can be used in the shower or bath.

Made from

Natural loofah and cotton material.

How to use

Wet mitt in warm water and gently rub on skin with or without cleanser in circular motions. When finished, simply rinse and allow to dry naturally.

How to dispose

This mitt is made from 100% natural materials meaning it is home compostable and biodegradable. When your glove reaches the end of its life, you can put it into your home compost bin.

entry.title: GLOW Body Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bare Nature
Type: Body Oil
Price: 25.00

Luxe body oil with an entrancing scent.  Made with nourishing plant oils to help hydrate, restore, and promote radiant skin.  

Ingredients

*Helianthus Annuus (sunflower seed) oil, *Argania Spinosa Kernel oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Seed oil, *Cannabis Sativa (hempseed) oil, Tocopherols (vitamin E), Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Fruit Oil, *Symphytum officinale (comfrey) leaf, Calendula officinalis (calendula) flower, *Achillea Millefolium (yarrow) flower, *Plantago major (plantain) leaf, Aniba rosaeodora (rosewood) Wood oil, Vanilla planifolia oil.

entry.title: Compostable Tube Deodorant - Rosemary Sage
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bare Nature
Type: Deodorant
Price: 20.00

Bare Nature deodorants last a minimum of 6+ months of usage.

The entire package is fully compostable! The labels are even printed on Stone Paper (using 0 water) and are photodegradable.

How they work, is by eliminating the odour causing bacteria.  Leaving you smelling FRESH like your deodorant, and not that awkward combination of body odour AND deodorant. 

Natural earthy, forest scent, great for both men and women.

Ingredients

Theobroma cacao (Cocoa) seed butter, *Cocos nucifera (Coconut) oil, Euphorbia cerifera (Candelilla) wax, Mangifera indica (Mango) seed butter, *Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) seed oil, Zinc oxide (non-nano), Sodium bicarbonate (non-aluminum), Maranta arudinacea (Arrowroot) root powder.

Rosemary Sage: Tea Tree, Rosemary, Cedarwood, Sage, Lime

entry.title: Onsight Care 2oz Travel Tin for Deodorant Bars
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Travel Tin
Price: 5.00

2 oz travel tin fits your Onsight Care deodorant bar for easier use on the go. The perfect size to throw in your backpack or workout bag.


Travel tins are silver, with a secure pop off lid. Perfect addition to your travel bag or for storage at home. Can be recycled at end of life.

entry.title: Citrus Fresh Tooth Powder
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: All Natural, Vegan Tooth Powder
Price: 10.00

Citrus Fresh tooth powder leaves your whole mouth feeling clean and fresh with a citrus taste. Perfect for traveling, our liquid-free formula leaves you worry free about oversized liquids in your carry-on! 

Features + Benefits

  • No Glycerin
  • No SLS
  • No Flouride
  • No toxins
  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

How it works

The bentonite clay base not only cleans, but also draws out impurities and remineralizes your teeth. While other ingredients also help with maintaining odour and teeth health. 

How to use 

Simply wet your toothbrush and dip into powder. Brush as normal. Toothpowder will foam, but not as much as traditional toothpaste.

Ingredients

Bentonite clay, Xylitol, Baking soda, Himalayan salt, Calcium powder, Essential oils of Lemon, and Wintergreen.

entry.title: Recovery Skin Salve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Vegan Skin Salve
Price: 13.00

Recovery Salve is great for when your body aches after a tough climbing session or long work day! Perfect for athletes to help soothe tension and pains.

Infused with anti-inflammatories, Arnica flowers and Menthol (found naturally in peppermint) for relief from inflammations, bruises and tension in the body. 


Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

How to use

Massage salve onto sore areas as needed. Should feel a slight cooling, refreshing sensation, but not overpowering.

CAUTION: Please wash hands before touching face as menthol will irritate eyes! If needed, rise out with soap and water. For external use only!

Not much is needed for it to work, so use sparingly. A little goes a long way so our salve lasts you longer!

Ingredients

Olive Oil, Shea Butter, Menthol, Candelilla wax, Arnica, Magnesium, and Essential oils of Camphor, Clove, Rosemary, and Lavender.

entry.title: Vegan Skin Salve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Vegan Skin Salve
Price: 12.00

Use Onsight Vegan Skin Salve to keep skin in its best condition after a tough day of rock climbing, work or everyday life. Our salve is for everyone who is rough on their hands and needs some soothing repair after a long day. Great for dry skin, cuts and scrapes.

Vegan Skin Salve is formulated to absorb quick so it's less greasy than traditional salves. Not much is needed for it to work, so use sparingly. A little goes a long way so our salve lasts you longer!

Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

Ingredients

entry.title: Eucalyptus & Peppermint Deodorant Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Deodorant
Price: 11.00

Onsight Care's Deodorant Bar is excellent at absorbing and neutralizing odours to keep you feeling fresh all day long. Slightly scented with Eucalyptus and Peppermint essential oils.

Save the plastic waste! Deodorant Bar comes unpackaged, for traveling we recommend a Travel Tin for safe storage.

Lasts approximately 3 months depending on personal use.

Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Aluminum Free
  • Plastic Free
  • Baking Soda Free

How it works

Bentonite Clay absorbs moisture and toxins from the skin quickly which helps eliminate odour. While Magnesium replaces baking soda with a more gentle approach to killing bacteria on the skin that cause odour, without blocking your pores.


To Use

Use just as commercial deodorant and glide onto underarms. Goes on clear. Can be prone to melt if left in direct sunlight or heat, please keep in cool dry space to prolong its life.
Pro Tip: Hold on skin for moment to heat up first, then glide for easier application.

Ingredients

Shea Butter, Arrowroot Powder, Cocoa Butter, Candelilla wax, Coconut oil, Magnesium Hydroxide, Bentonite Clay, Eucalyptus and Peppermint Essential oils.

entry.title: Bamboo Collection Reusable Swabs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Naked Swab
Type: Reusable Swab
Price: 25.00

NakedSwab is a reusable, sustainable and sanitary alternative to cotton swabs and Q-tips. 

1 NakedSwab = 2000 Cotton Swabs! 

Dual Use

Use swabs for cleaning!

Use swabs for correcting makeup! 

Swabs can be used for so much more! 

Each set comes with 4 Bamboo Swabs

How do I clean my NakedSwab?

Cleaning your NakedSwab is quick and easy- just use soap and water!

How long does NakedSwab last for?

NakedSwab has been designed to last for up to 2000 uses!

entry.title: Original Zero Waste Toothpaste - Fennel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nelson Naturals
Type: Toothpaste
Price: 12.00

Fennel was first introduced in India for oral care, where Fennel commonly serves as a mouth freshener (Mukhwas) after meals. Our Fennel toothpaste is a herbaceous, cooling, ultra refreshing formula that is also mint-free.

Does not contain Glycerin, SLS or Fluoride.

93g Glass Jar.

Ingredients

Calcium Carbonate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Colloidal Silver, Sea Salt (Sel marin), Xylitol, Castile Soap, Trace Mineral Concentrate, Foeniculum Vulgare (Fennel) Oil.

entry.title: Original Zero Waste Toothpaste - Citrus Spice Blend
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nelson Naturals
Type: Toothpaste
Price: 12.00

Our Best selling “classic” toothpaste formula. This is our take on a Thieves oil blend and it is incredible. This flavour has hints of mint, cinnamon, citrus, rosemary and clove, and is sure to make your brushing experience exceptional every time.

Does not contain Glycerin, SLS or Fluoride.

93g Glass Jar.

Ingredients

Calcium Carbonate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Xylitol, Sea Salt, Colloidal Silver, Castile Soap, Trace Mineral Concentrate, Essential Oils of Sweet Orange, Cinnamon, Clove, Rosemary, & Peppermint.

The Cooling Mist brings you the fresh feeling you crave post-workout. The 60 ml spray bottle is filled with a refreshing aloe vera, cucumber and spearmint blend to spray as a facial mist, body mist, and aromatic mist post-movement. 

Ingredients

Distilled Water, Aloe Vera Juice, Cucumber Extract, Essential Oil Blend (Cucumber, Spearmint)

Use this spray as a facial mist, body mist, and aromatic mist.

entry.title: Organic Biodegradable Bamboo Cotton Buds (200 Swabs)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Organic Biodegradable Bamboo Cotton Buds
Price: 8.00

An all natural, eco-friendly and sustainable swap for single use disposable cotton swabs. Organic Biodegradable Bamboo Cotton Buds are plastic free, waste free, non GMO, biodegradable, compostable, cruelty free and vegan.

Organic cotton is super soft, hypoallergenic and safe for use on even the most sensitive skin. Organic cotton is grown without the use of pesticides, is free from bleach and 0 chemicals or fragrances are used during manufacturing.

Use these biodegradable swabs for touching up, removing and applying make up and skincare products, cleaning your ears, fixing nail polish mistakes, cleaning up pets, cleansing baby’s delicate eye or ear areas + for anything else you would normally use a swab for!

Features + Benefits

  • One pack comes with 200 biodegradable swabs
  • Packaging is 100% recyclable 
  • Eco-friendly and sustainable swap for disposable cotton swabs
  • Made from 100% organic cotton and natural bamboo
  • 100% plastic free product
  • 100% biodegradable and home compostable 
  • Hypoallergenic, pesticide and bleach free

How to use

Use these swabs exactly as you would use regular disposable swabs, for cleaning and grooming. The difference? Once you have finished, pop these biodegradable swabs in your home compost bin after use. Recycle paper packaging once empty.

Do not insert directly into ear canal. Keep out of reach of children.

entry.title: Chocolate Mandarin Hand, Body and Lip Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Essence Organics
Type: Skin Treatment
Price: 18.00

This rich balm is ideal for moisturizing and soothing dry, rough skin. Within a few seconds of application the skin appears and feels noticeably softer and smoother. Chocolate Mandarin is an excellent option for those who have dehydrated skin, as the key ingredients offer a rich, long lasting hydration that help to naturally improve the skin’s overall elasticity, texture and moisture.

Features + Benefits

  • Hydrates and soothes dry, chapped, and sensitive skin
  • Offers rich, long lasting hydration for dry hands, heels, and lips
  • Naturally concentrated formula helps maintain softer, smoother skin
  • Subtle cocoa butter and orange natural aroma.
  • Leaping Bunny Certified, Non GMO, Gluten Free and Fair Trade

Composition

This fresh organic formulation effectively softens and nourishes, while the vast amount of cocoa butter keeps the skin flexible, sealing in moisture.

Ingredients

Jojoba Seed Oil*, Cocoa Butter*, Beeswax, Rosehip Seed Oil*, Coconut Oil*, Castor Oil*, Orange Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin-E) *Ingredient from organic farming

entry.title: Cat Lady Vegan Natural Deodorant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Routine Natural Goods
Type: Deodorant
Price: 28.00

Cat Lady Vegan natural cream deodorant from Routine has an amazing sweet and fruity scent profile. Coconut pulp, pineapple, and vanilla are the predominant scents making this deodorant smell like a pineapple upside down birthday cake.

Features + Benefits

  • VEGAN (Classic Formula, No Beeswax)
  • Coconut pulp and vanilla essential oils 
  • Strawberry and vanilla flavour oils
  • 58g, enough for 3-6 months with regular use
  • All natural ingredients and cruelty free
  • 12 months once opened

Ingredients

Cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, magnesium hydroxide, zea mays (corn, non-gmo) starch, kaolin, maranta arundinacea (arrowroot), sodium bicarbonate (baking soda), theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, caprylic/capric triglyceride (fractionated coconut oil), cetearyl olivate, sorbitan olivate, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, olea europaea (olive) fruit oil, tocopherol (vitamin e), hectorite, brassica glycerides, calendula officinalis (marigold), aroma: cocos nucifera (coconut) fruit extract, flavor oil (organic rosemary antioxidant, strawberry, pineapple), vanilla planifolia.

entry.title: Natural Hand Cleansing Gel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Hand Soap
Price: 6.00

This natural and chemical-free alternative to hand cleanser is infused with organic chamomile, aloe vera, with Vitamin B5 to prevent drying leaving your hands moisturized and germ-free. 

Features + Benefits

  • Hand Sanitizer
  • One pump is sufficient for full coverage.
  • Made with 99% Isopropyl Alcohol with a concentration (65% V/V)
  • 2oz Airless Pump

Ingredients

Alcohol denat (99% Isopropyl Alcohol), aqua, aloe barbadensis leaf extract, cocamidopropyl betaine, glycerine, melaleuca alternifolia, citrus sinensis, dl-panthenol, xanthan Gum, lecithin, sclerotium gum, pullulan. Scented contains Sweet Orange and Grapefruit essential Oil.

entry.title: Cuticle Therapy Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Cuticle Oil
Price: 11.00

Cuticle therapy oil quicky and easily moisturizes cuticles that are essential for nail health. Soften and strengthen your nails with our luxurious oil. Oils like rosehip, jojoba, and argan will quickly penetrate the nail bed to make nails shiny and healthy. 

Features + Benefits

  • 100% Natural
  • 100% Organic
  • Gluten Free
  • GMO Free
  • Vegan
  • Cruelty Free
  • BPA FREE Twist Pen

How to use 

Twist bottom of brush cap until a drop of oil dampens the bristles. Rub bristles all over the nail bed. Massage as necessary

Ingredients

Rosa canina fruit oil, camellia sinensis leaf oil, oenothera biennis (evening primrose) oil,   butyrospermum parkii (shea butter), simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, , argania spinosa (argan) kernel oil,  tocopherol (vitamin e), citrus sinensis (sweet orange) oil, citrus limonum (lemon) oil, citrus aurantifolia (lime) oil, citrus paradisi (white grape fruit) oil, mentha piperita (peppermint) oil, mentha spicata (spearmint) oil.
